title: How do I change my game's language to Korean?
body: As the title suggests, I want to change my client and game language to korean, how do I go about doing this? All videos and threads I find on google seem to be outdated. Thanks.

replies.body:
If you're using the Beta Client, there is currently no way to do this. Korean isn't supported on the NA region, and it commonly breaks a lot of text elements inside the client and game, so it's not something we support doing.

Let me know if you have any questions.

On the subject of modding, _I_ have some questions:

There was stated that new client shares files with the legacy one. Clearly, that is happening on an individual basis.

The login screen, for example. I have the Elementalist Lux login "installed" (replaced 4 files, duh) on the legacy one, but the new client shows the...I dunno, assassin rework login?
**How can I replace the login screen in the new client?** 
And can I still use the .swf-logins of old? I really want the Quinn login to work again. That one is beautiful!

Custom champion splash arts. The legacy one displays what has been replaced, but the new one only shows the official ones.
**Where are the splash arts for the new client stored?**

Custom itemsets. I have the .properties file with the custom ones in the "preferences" folder in the legacy install folder, but what is "ItemSets.json" located in the config folder located just under the main install location? It clearly is the same file, but it doesn't appear be an updated one.
**Is ItemSets.json the custom itemset file that is read by the new client? **
_If it is, that would explain why my custom itemsets when using the new client feels like...missing something._

If the code in the itemset file was arranged properly, aka downwards, I could work with it manually. It'd be a hazzle, but one that I'd heartily take.

<html>
    <head>
        <title>Like so</title>
    </head>
    <body>
PLEASE!!
    </body>
</html>

With all the code sideways...

{"timeStamp":1479639544029,"itemSets":[{"sortrank":4,"mode":"any","isGlobalForMaps":true,"type":"global","isGlobalForChampions":true,"title":

...I'd be needing a lot of sanity potions. :(

---------

And is modifying game.cfg still working with the new client? I surely hope not!

>WindowMode=1
Height=1200
Width=5760

######_Yes, I got 3x 1920x1200 monitors._

gg :|
